import User from"../classes/User";import debug from"../lib/debug";const defaultUserState={currentUser:new User(),authenticated:false,userToken:null,// Used for token authentication with backend
timelineList:[]};function userReducer(state,action){debug(action);debug(state);let obj=action.payload;let newState=null;switch(action.type){case"set":newState={...state,...obj};break;case"user":newState={...state,currentUser:obj};break;case"list":newState={...state,timelineList:[...obj]};break;case"reset":newState=defaultUserState;break;default:newState=state;}return newState;}export{userReducer,defaultUserState};
